trans-unit.source: Barman (Backup and Recovery Manager) is an open source administration tool for disaster recovery of PostgreSQL servers written in Python.
trans-unit.target: Barman(Backup and Recovery Manager)是一个用Python编写的PostgreSQL服务器灾难恢复的开源管理工具。

trans-unit.source: Barman is written and maintained by PostgreSQL professionals 2ndQuadrant.
trans-unit.target: Barman由PostgreSQL专业人士2ndQuadrant编写和维护。

trans-unit.source: Client Utilities for Barman, Backup and Recovery Manager for PostgreSQL
trans-unit.target: Barman的客户端实用程序,PostgreSQL的备份和恢复管理器。
